fullText: The musical transforms the Broadway Theatre into a nightclub, with audience members dancing alongside the performers in an immersive experience that brings Imelda Marcos's story to life through David Byrne's pulsing disco score.
dtliExcerpt: The musical transforms the Broadway Theatre into a nightclub, with audience members dancing alongside the performers in an immersive experience that brings Imelda Marcos's story to life through David Byrne's pulsing disco score.
